tasks.task: Upgrade a solar power system for a house
subtasks: Purchase additional batteries for the solar system
Install new solar panels on the other side of the building
Replace high-wattage outdoor lights with lower-wattage alternatives
Consider cost increases due to inflation and price changes over time
Balance energy usage to manage battery levels and avoid draining during nighttime
Ensure proper orientation of solar panels to maximize sunlight exposure
Regularly check the condition of solar panels and batteries
Clean solar panels to remove dust and debris
Test inverters and other ancillary equipment for proper functionality
Evaluate the system’s performance and efficiency annually
Plan for potential future upgrades to accommodate increasing energy needs
Monitor electricity usage and adjust to optimize performance of the solar system

tasks.task: Acquire subsidies or incentives for solar energy installation
subtasks: Research available government or utility company incentives for solar power systems
Apply for any relevant subsidies or tax credits to offset costs
Compare costs and benefits of different financing options for the system's upgrades
